snippet: The Federal Reserve reported that consumer borrowing expanded $15.5 billion in February after a $10.8 billion gain in January.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that consumer borrowing expanded by $15.5 billion in February, to record high of $3.34 trillion.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve reported that consumer borrowing expanded $15.5 billion in February after a $10.8 billion gain in January.

headline.print_headline: Loans for Cars and Tuition Push Borrowing to Record High
headline.main: Loans for Cars and Tuition Push Borrowing to Record High
